conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D model: walls have height/thickness, multiple wall faces are visible, interior volume is readable, and the view is angled (not top-down).

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion with readable corners and interior volumes; clean cutaway with minimal geometry breakage. Minor simplicity in wall-edge detailing.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall 3BHK organization and major adjacencies resemble the 2D plan (central living/dining, bedrooms distributed around). However, exterior articulations (notably balconies/utility) and some partition placements/openings appear simplified or not fully consistent with the plan.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture (beds, sofa, dining) is present and mostly in plausible rooms. Kitchen/bath detailing is limited and some fixture specificity is missing compared to the plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render with clear wall/floor separation and good visibility. Monochrome materials reduce feature legibility for doors/windows but no major artifacts or UI/text clutter.

detected_errors.description: Balcony/utility/exterior recess features from the 2D plan appear reduced or not faithfully modeled, affecting outline fidelity.
Door/window placement and sizing are simplified; several openings are not clearly verifiable against the 2D plan.
Kitchen and bathroom fixtures are minimal/abstracted relative to the labeled 2D plan, reducing room-identity confirmation.

summary: A true, clean cutaway 3D conversion with strong volumetric fidelity, but with moderate simplification/mismatch in balconies/exterior geometry and opening/fixture detail versus the 2D plan.
